com.cmput301w13t09.cmput301project.helpers

Class PhotoAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.cmput301w13t09.cmput301project.helpers.PhotoAdapter

  • public class PhotoAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Class: PhotoAdapter A class that contains an array list of bitmaps and returns them to the grid view of photo picker layout.
